segments.text: I notice the woman drying the plate as if nothing else exists, completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Thereâ€™s something surreal about the way she stands in the middle of the brewing storm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the puddle continues to grow, a silent danger lurking beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy, climbing higher and higher, makes my heart race with every inch he ascends that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? I can already imagine the crash and shatter of dishes, the chaos of pain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cookies glistening in the jar, a treasure for the children daring enough to seize it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how they are both so focused, oblivious to the potential consequences of their risky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR
